Package bacnet.scripts.phylogeny

Class PhylogenyToolsJolley

java.lang.Object
bacnet.scripts.phylogeny.PhylogenyToolsJolley
public class PhylogenyToolsJolley extends Object
This list of function is useful to manipulate Newick files given by Jolley in May 2012, from its publication Jolley et al. Microb. 2012
It contains 1565 nodes, each bacteria=node has an ID. The link between these ID and an NCBI ID (i.e. NC32010.1) is given by the table at GenomePhylogeny.PATH_INFOTABLE
Author:
Christophe BÃ©cavin
